name: Fusion Ribs
instructions: Rub and ribs: In a small bowl, mix together garlic, sage, rosemary, salt, peppers, soy sauce, sake and Tabasco.
Rub onto ribs to coat thoroughly.
Place ribs on fire and allow to cook covered, until fork tender.
Sauce: Heat olive oil in a sauté pan.
Add garlic and sauté until fragrant.
Reduce heat to simmer, cook for 5-7 minutes.
